title: How to Install Proton Mail Desktop App on Ubuntu
description:
Discover a step-by-step guide to installing the Proton Mail Desktop App on Ubuntu and RedHat-based distributions with practical examples.

The post How to Install Proton Mail Desktop App on Ubuntu appeared first on Linux Today.

title: DXVK 2.3.1 Brings More Efficient Shader Code Generation on NVIDIA GPUs
description:
DXVK 2.3.1 Vulkan-based implementation of D3D9, D3D10, and D3D11 for Linux / Wine is now available for download bringing several improvements and bug fixes for various games.

The post DXVK 2.3.1 Brings More Efficient Shader Code Generation on NVIDIA GPUs appeared first on Linux Today.
